data.title: Razan
authors: Contributors to Solo Leveling Simulator Wiki
data.text:
Monsters inside the gate that poses great danger if ever a Dungeon Break occurs.

Wolf-like creatures with skin as dark as the void, red glowing eyes, sharp fangs and claws.

Battle Information

- If the Magic Beast has a color mentioned in it's name, this means that they are the Normal variant of the Razan specie.

- If the Magic Beast's name doesn't have any color mentioned, this means that they are the Boss variant of the Razan specie. If the Magic Beasts emoji has color highlights on the side this also means that they are a Boss, same thing if they have "_" an underscore.

Unlike the Raikans, this Magic Beasts is more resistant to Physical and Magic attacks.

Attributes

Stats HP STR INT DEF MR 90 20 10 40 60

Movement/Range Stats AGI Range 2 1

Skills

Available Skills Skill Name Description Type Bone Crunch Razan ferociously gnaws at a Hunter dealing Physical DMG. If the target is below 50% HP, they will be stunned for 1-2 turns. Physical Evolve From harnessing the mana from it's surroundings, it evolves into a stronger variant of itself. Passive
